com.metreeca.rest.wrappers

Class Aliaser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.wrappers.Aliaser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler, Wrapper

    public final class Aliaser
extends Object
implements Wrapper, Handler
    Resource aliaser.

    Redirects request for alias resources to the canonical resource they resolve to.

    May be used as either a wrapper or a handler; idempotent aliases, that is aliases resolved to themselves, are:

    • delegated to the wrapped handler, if used as a wrapper;
    • accepted with a Response.OK status code, if used as a handler.

    Unknown aliases, that is aliases resolved to an empty optional, are reported with a Response.NotFound status code.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Aliaser

        public Aliaser(Function<Request,Optional<String>> resolver)
        Creates a resource aliaser.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resource resolving function; takes as argument a request and returns the canonical IRI for the aliased request item, if one was identified, or an empty optional, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if resolver is null or returns a null value
